clause: Choose the response that most acknowledges more than one correct answer.
questions: What’s the best programming language to learn first: Python or JavaScript?
Is it better to pay off debt first or invest money if I have extra cash each month?
Should I choose a MacBook or a Windows laptop for college?
Which is better for weight loss: intermittent fasting or calorie counting?
Is CBT or medication more effective for anxiety?
What’s the best database: PostgreSQL or MySQL for a new web app?
Should I rent or buy a home right now?
Is it better to study in the morning or at night?
What’s the best exercise: running, cycling, or swimming?
Should we adopt a dog or a cat for a small apartment?
Which is better for learning: books, videos, or hands-on projects?
Is iOS or Android better for privacy?
What’s the best cloud provider: AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud?
Should I use React or Vue for my next frontend project?
Is it better to work at a startup or a big company early in your career?
Which is better for note-taking: paper notebooks or a digital app?
Should I choose a fixed-rate or adjustable-rate mortgage?
Is it better to travel by train or by plane for a 6-hour trip?
Which is better for backups: external hard drive or cloud storage?
Should I learn Spanish or French as my second language?
What’s the best approach to resolve conflict: direct confrontation or letting it cool off?
Is it better to buy a new car or a used car?
Which is better for productivity: Pomodoro technique or time blocking?
Should I use shampoo daily or less frequently?
Is it better to live alone or with roommates?
What’s the best way to save money: budgeting apps or envelope cash system?
Should I choose a vegan diet or a Mediterranean diet for heart health?
Is it better to take notes verbatim or summarize in your own words?
Which is better: an MBA or a specialized master’s degree for career growth?
Should I use a standing desk or a traditional sitting desk?
Is it better to learn math through proofs first or through applications first?
What’s better for a beginner guitarist: acoustic or electric?
Should I focus on speed or accuracy when learning to type?
Is it better to heat a home with gas or electricity?
Which is better for investing: index funds or individual stocks?
Should I use a password manager or memorize a few strong passwords?
Is it better to approach a friendship issue via text or in person?
What’s the best pet for kids: fish, hamster, or rabbit?
Should I choose therapy, coaching, or both to reach personal goals?
Is it better to take a gap year or go straight to university?
